DOC.brief_title: Specific Respiratory Infections Triggers Acute Medical Events
DOC.detailed_description: We conduct time series study correlate anonymised population level data sample NHS laboratory test positive six common respiratory virus admission NHS hospital England range cardiac vascular outcome time period 01/01/2004 31/12/2014 . This involve generate Poisson regression model control factor seasonal long-term trend , environmental temperature humidity . This study fund Academy Medical Sciences Starter Grant Clinical Lecturers .
DOC.criteria: Any individual record eligible outcome ( ICD10 cod hospitalisation myocardial infarction stroke ) within study period age 45+ year Any individual record eligible exposure ( laboratoryconfirmed respiratory virus ) within study period age Outcome event occur people age < 45 year
